attributes.action: Change the Patron Saint of England from St George to Ace Rimmer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do we have to have a Turkish saint when we have Ace Rimmer available , anyone who can surf on a crocodile and rescue Princess Bonjella from the Nazis gets my vote.

"smoke me a kipper I'll be back for breakfast"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
